attributes.action: Should it be a law that every school should have a councillor that is specialised in child abuse for children ?
attributes.additional_details: We want to start a C.A.S unit (Child Abuse Service) where chlildren feel comfortable around specialised councillors to discuss if they have been a victim, witness, concerned of a childs welfare, or children who are generally interested in the topic. By doing this, our aim is to raise awareness on child abuse.
